backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and moderation with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing key frontend files, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variable definitions with OKLCH color tokens for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app with the main script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuration using TanStack Router with lazy‑loaded pages including the GoldWaterTrackerPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthorName: Displays a username for a principal via query, falling back to a shortened principal when missing.
frontend/src/components/admin/FlaggedPos: Admin panel listing auto‑flagged posts with filters, sorting, and flag‑clearing actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedCo: Admin panel listing reported comments with actions to clear reports or delete comments.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedPo: Admin panel for viewing reported posts and allowing report clearing or post deletion.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Displays an 18+ confirmation dialog for age‑gated routes and blocks access until acknowledged.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth, query cache clearing, and age‑gate reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Renders a single comment with reporting and reaction actions plus error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top‑level layout with navigation, gates, and performance markers wrapping the app content.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Slide‑in mobile navigation menu showing links based on auth and admin status.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Moder: Simple styled alert component for moderation warnings.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post card with media, reactions, reporting, and deletion logic, handling navigation and errors for each action.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Shows a profile setup dialog for new authenticated users and saves basic profile info including adult confirmation.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Renders reaction buttons with icons, selection state, pending handling, and click callbacks.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Provides generic UI components for loading skeletons, error messages, empty states, and background refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Displays a centered spinner and message while route-based code chunks are loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendExternalBlo: Converts ExternalBlob video data into accessible URLs, preferring direct URLs and managing object URL cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Converts ExternalBlob image data into browser-safe URLs using direct links or generated object URLs with cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current identity details and fetches the caller's user profile with status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login logic, loading identities, handling status, and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, content guidelines, posts, and related actor-based API calls with pagination and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom components including moderation alert styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders an admin-only moderation interface with tabs for reviewing reported and flagged content.
frontend/src/pages/FactsPage.tsx: Displays a card of numerous human-urine-related facts.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Implements the main feed with infinite posts, post creation, media uploads, moderation handling, and performance instrumentation.
Embeds an external water-tracking tool in a styled page layout.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero section, community description, and conditional CTA based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LoveTheLiquidPage.tsx: Displays a support/donation page with Ko‑fi integration and a session‑persisted thank‑you message system.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with comments, handles loading, errors, comment creation, and includes performance instrumentation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides an authenticated user profile editor with fields for username, bio, preferences, and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/TipsPage.tsx: Static page listing hydration tips and urine facts in styled card sections.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Manages age‑gate persistence in localStorage and determines whether a route is age‑restricted.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utility helpers for encoding optional values for Candid and checking presence.
frontend/src/utils/flaggedPostsView.ts: Utilities for working with flagged posts, including reason extraction, media checks, filtering, and timestamp sorting.
frontend/src/utils/moderation.ts: Provides helpers to detect moderation block errors, extract readable messages, and categorize error types.
frontend/src/utils/perf.ts: Implements development‑only performance marking, measuring, logging, and clearing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Validates image files, converts them to backend blobs, handles optional images, manages preview URLs, and extracts error messages.
frontend/src/utils/postVideos.ts: Validates video files, converts them to backend blobs, and manages video preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for embedding the Quench Joy Flow site.
